title: Testing the Waters — Terraform's AI Pilot in Action

operationalSignals.pilotUsability: High usability scores from pilot team

stakeholderVoices.name: Pilot Team Feedback
stakeholderVoices.quote: Pilot team reports high usability and +5.4% procurement efficiency improvement in 8 weeks. Team is optimistic about scaling the approach.

stakeholderVoices.name: Non-Pilot Team Concerns
stakeholderVoices.quote: HR flags confusion across non-pilot teams. Some departments feel left out and question why they weren't included in the pilot.

stakeholderVoices.name: CFO Assessment
stakeholderVoices.quote: CFO impressed with preliminary results. Notes the efficiency gains and sees potential for broader application. Requests detailed ROI analysis.

stakeholderVoices.name: HR & Organizational Impact
stakeholderVoices.quote: HR reports mixed signals. Some teams are eager to join the pilot, others are concerned about job security and training needs.

stakeholderVoices.name: Board Request
stakeholderVoices.quote: Board wants clarity by next quarter. They need a clear decision on whether to expand, stop, or pivot to a full transformation roadmap.

stakeholderVoices.name: Supplier Engagement
stakeholderVoices.quote: Low supplier response engagement in pilot. Some suppliers are hesitant to fully engage with the AI system, preferring traditional communication.

decisionOptions.title: Expand Pilot to a Second Business Unit
Pause Pilot and Revert to Traditional Strategy

constraints: Board wants clarity by next quarter
Mixed organizational sentiment outside the pilot
